00003  * @brief Comments theme include.
00004  * 
00005  * Used by comments_template().

00012  * @package     WordPress
00013  * @subpackage  Boo_Theme
00014  */
00015 
00016 global $booPage;
00017 
00018 if (!empty($_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']) && 'comments.php' == basename($_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME'])) {
00019     die ('Please do not load comments page directly!');
00020 }
00021 
00022 if (post_password_required()) {
00023     $booPage->msgError->addMessage('This post is password protected!');
00024     $booPage->msgError->saveSession();
00025     $booPage->redirect();
00026 }
00027 ?>
00028 <?php if (have_comments()): ?>
00029     <div class="box-wp-comments box-wp box clearfix">
00030         <div class="head clearfix">
00031             <h2><?php comments_number('No Responses', 'One Response', '% Responses' );?> to <?php the_title(); ?></h2>
00032         </div>
00033         <div class="body clearfix">
00034             <ol class="wp-comment-list">
00035                 <?php wp_list_comments(); ?>
00036             </ol>
00037         </div>
00038     </div>
00039     <?php if (next_comments_link() || previous_comments_link()): ?>
00040         <div class="box-wp-nav box-wp box clearfix">
00041             <div class="body clearfix">
00042                 <div class="align-left"><?php previous_comments_link('Older Comments'); ?></div>
00043                 <div class="align-right"><?php next_comments_link('Newer Comments'); ?></div>
00044             </div>
00045         </div>
00046     <?php endif; ?>
00047 
00048 <?php else: // no comments ?>
00049 
00050     <?php if ('open' == $post->comment_status): ?>
00051         <div class="box-wp-comments box-wp box clearfix">
00052             <div class="head clearfix">
00053                 <h2>No Comments</h2>
00054             </div>
00055             <div class="body clearfix">
00056                 <p>Be the first to comment.</p>
00057             </div>
00058         </div>
00059     <?php else : // comments are closed ?>
00060         <div class="box-wp-comments box-wp box clearfix">
00061             <div class="head clearfix">
00062                 <h2>No Comments</h2>
00063             </div>
00064             <div class="body clearfix">
00065                 <p class="wp-no-comments">Comments are closed.</p>
00066             </div>
00067         </div>
00068     <?php endif; ?>
00069 <?php endif; ?>
00070 <?php if ('open' == $post->comment_status): ?>
00071     <div class="box-wp-respond box-wp box clearfix">
00072         <div class="head clearfix">
00073             <h1><?php comment_form_title( 'Leave a Reply', 'Leave a Reply to %s' ); ?></h1>
00074         </div>
00075         <div class="body clearfix">
00076             <div class="wp-cancel-comment-reply">
00077                 <small><?php cancel_comment_reply_link(); ?></small>
00078             </div>
00079             <?php if (get_option('comment_registration') && !$user_ID): ?>
00080                 <p>You must be <a href="<?php echo get_option('siteurl'); ?>/wp-login.php?redirect_to=<?php echo urlencode(get_permalink()); ?>">logged in</a> to post a comment.</p>
00081             <?php else: ?>
00082                 <form action="<?php echo get_option('siteurl'); ?>/wp-comments-post.php" method="post" id="wp-comment-form">
00083                 <?php if ($user_ID): ?>
00084                     <p>Logged in as <a href="<?php echo get_option('siteurl'); ?>/wp-admin/profile.php"><?php echo $user_identity; ?></a>. <a href="<?php echo wp_logout_url(get_permalink()); ?>" title="Log out of this account">Log out &raquo;</a></p>
00085                 <?php else: ?>
00086                     <p>
00087                         <input type="text" name="author" id="author" value="<?php echo $comment_author; ?>" size="22" tabindex="1" <?php if ($req) echo "aria-required='true'"; ?> />
00088                         <label for="author"><small>Name <?php if ($req) echo "(required)"; ?></small></label>
00089                     </p>
00090                     <p>
00091                         <input type="text" name="email" id="email" value="<?php echo $comment_author_email; ?>" size="22" tabindex="2" <?php if ($req) echo "aria-required='true'"; ?> />
00092                         <label for="email"><small>Mail (will not be published) <?php if ($req) echo "(required)"; ?></small></label>
00093                     </p>
00094                     <p>
00095                         <input type="text" name="url" id="url" value="<?php echo $comment_author_url; ?>" size="22" tabindex="3" />
00096                         <label for="url"><small>Website</small></label>
00097                     </p>
00098                 <?php endif; ?>
00099                 <p>
00100                     <textarea name="comment" id="comment" cols="50" rows="10" tabindex="4"></textarea>
00101                 </p>
00102                 <p>
00103                     <input name="submit" class="button-submit button" type="submit" id="submit" tabindex="5" value="Submit" />
00104                 </p>
00105                 <fieldset>
00106                     <?php comment_id_fields(); ?>
00107                     <?php do_action('comment_form', $post->ID); ?>
00108                 </fieldset>
00109             </form>
00110         </div>
00111     </div>
00112 <?php endif; ?>
00113 <?php endif; // if you delete this the sky will fall on your head ?>
